/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding to the grandeur of the cityscape.
